meanings.definition: A type of sock worn in bed for warmth.
meanings.sent1: I always wear my cozy bedsocks to keep my feet warm at night.
meanings.sent2: She bought a new pair of bedsocks to wear to bed during the winter.
meanings.sent3: The bedsocks were so fluffy, they made me feel like I was walking on clouds.
meanings.sent4: Her bedsocks were like tiny blankets for her feet, keeping them toasty all night.
meanings.sent5: The colorful bedsocks had cute patterns that made bedtime more fun.

meanings.definition: Socks specifically designed to be worn while sleeping.
meanings.sent1: My grandmother always knits me a pair of bedsocks to wear to bed.
meanings.sent2: He put on his favorite bedsocks before getting under the covers.
meanings.sent3: The bedsocks had little sheep on them, making them perfect for counting sheep before sleep.
meanings.sent4: Her bedsocks were like a hug for her feet, helping her drift off to dreamland.
meanings.sent5: The soft bedsocks felt like a gentle embrace around her toes as she slept.
